forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain, then a chance of a thunderstorm and rain in the afternoon. Fog early. High of 13C. Windy. Winds from the SSE at 30 to 40 km/h with gusts to 45 km/h. Chance of rain 100% with rainfall amounts near 23.4 mm possible.
